Extra_notes: Nine stimulus intensitieswere used, ranging from 1J to 9J, and spaced at 0.25J intervals.

Measurement_information: Laser energy used (Joules) expressed as class character (*.rds format only).

Extra_notes: SPARS is a -50 to +50 scale anchored at -50 with 'no sensation', at 0 with 'the exact point at which what you feel transitions to pain', and at +50 with 'the worst pain you can imagine'.

Measurement_information: Rating scale data after correcting SPARS to a positive scale covering 0 (no sensation) to 100 (worst pain you can imagine) by adding 50.
